Name: Fireplace Fashioned
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: POUR whisky and water into ice-filled glass and set aside. Separately, STIR other ingredients with ice. Discard contents of glass and strain stirred cocktail into the chilled Islay whisky washed glass.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Santiago Michelis at Alcoholic Architecture, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Fireplace Fashioned contains 178 calories
